subject: English
title: Chapter 01 Rain in the Night
content:
--- Page 1 ---
1. Rain in the TOA —s cece eccccccccccccccceccccecsscceees

— .
JTDGRH

ere’ll be rivers in the

And lakes along the stre
It will make our lazy kitty
Wash his little dirty feet.

The roses will wear diamonds
Like kings and queens at court;

But the pansies all get muddy

Because they are so short.

Vfl sail my boat tomorrow

In wonderful new places,
But first Pll take my watering-pot
And wash the pansies’ faces

POPP Oe HEHE EE EEE OEE EE EEE EE EEEEE EEE OOE EEE EEEE EEE EEEEEEEEEEE EE EOOEEHELEEH HEHE EEE HS ELE EEE ELE LESS ELEEE EEE LELELELELES

e gutters : channels at the edge of a street that carry off water.

e pansies : small plants or their flowers. The flowers have purple, yellow
or white velvety petals.

1. Answer the following questions :
(a) How long has it been raining ?
(b) What effect will the rain have on the following :
* kitty * TOSeS * pansies
(c) What is the child planning to do the next day ?

2. Describe in 3-5 lines what happens when it rains in your surroundings.
